description: As a User I want to access orders section So I amend boookings
name: User should be able to amend boookings

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional : Ensuring that the amend booking page responds accordingly to change events

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'

steps.name: I click the view button for an order in the orders table
I ensure the order to be amended matches my last created order
I click the "Edit Order" Button beside "Go to Dashboard" button
I should be taken to "Amending Booking" page
I should see "From,To,Who,when" sections
I should see "Available Options" card which should contain "Previous Day" and "Next Day"
At least a time selection must be selected
I should see a compartment section with a compartment selected
I should see atleast a seat is selected for the compartment
I proceed to change route by clicking the green swap location toggle
I should no longer see the "Reservation" Seating Compartments section
I click the "Discard edits and return to order" button to return to the Order Page
I click the Edit Order Button beside More Actions dropdown
I edit the 'Who' section by removing '1x Adult'
I should no longer see the "Reservation" Seating Compartments section
I click the "Discard edits and return to order" button to return to the Order Page
I click the Edit Order Button beside More Actions dropdown
I edit the 'Date' section by clicking the 'Next Day' button
I should no longer see the "Reservation" Seating Compartments section
I click the "Discard edits and return to order" button to return to the Order Page
I click the Edit Order Button beside More Actions dropdown

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional : Ensuring that a booking can be amended by removing an Adult

steps.name: I click the view button for an order in the orders table
I ensure the order to be amended matches my last created order
I click the "Edit Order" Button beside "Go to Dashboard" button
I should be taken to "Amending Booking" page
I proceed to change route by clicking the green swap location toggle
The "Commit Changes" Button should be Inactive
I edit the 'Who' section by removing '1x Adult'
I edit the 'Date' section by clicking the 'Next Day' button
I select a time for 'Add-Ons' Single Train ride
I select seats in the reservation compartment section
The "Commit Changes" Button should be Active
I click the "Commit Changes" button
The "Refund" Button should be Active if The Sub Total is negative else the "Checkout" Button should be active where either button is the action button
I click the action button
I process a refund or checkout
I should see a "Booking amended" header
I ckick the view order button to verify all changes are reflected

steps.name: I click the view button for an order in the orders table
I ensure the order to be amended matches my last created order
I click the "Edit Order" Button beside "Go to Dashboard" button
I should be taken to "Amending Booking" page
I click the "Add Another Item to Order" button
I should see a modal with header "New Order Item:"
I should see a "Cancel" button and a "Save Changes" button
I should see "From,To,Who,when" sections in the modal
I should see "Available Options" card which should contain "Previous Day" and "Next Day" in the modal
I proceed to change route by clicking the green swap location toggle in the modal
I select a time for 'Add-Ons' Single Train ride in the modal
I click the "Save Changes" button
The modal should be closed
I should see a new "From,To,Who,when" sections added
The Spinner should disappear
I should see a new Available Options Card added
